org.hps.recon.tracking

Class MultipleScattering

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lcsim.recon.tracking.seedtracker.MultipleScattering
      • org.hps.recon.tracking.MultipleScattering

  • public class MultipleScattering
extends MultipleScattering
    Extention of lcsim class to allow use of local classes. Finds scatter points and magnitude from detector geometry directly.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  MultipleScattering.ScatterPoint
      Nested class to encapsulate the scatter angles and which detector element it is related to
      class  MultipleScattering.ScatterPoints
      Nested class to encapsulate a list of scatters

      • FindScatters

        public List<ScatterAngle> FindScatters(HelicalTrackFit helix)
        Override lcsim version and select material manager depending on object type. This allows to use a local extension of the material manager in the lcsim track fitting code.
        Overrides:
        FindScatters in class MultipleScattering
        Parameters:
        helix -
        Returns:
        a list of ScatterAngle.
